config.neo4j.topic.cypher.algod_indexer_public_: FOREACH (x IN CASE WHEN event.typeenum = 1 AND event.txn_rcv IS NOT NULL THEN [1] ELSE [] END | MERGE (snd:Account{account: event.txn_snd}) MERGE (rcv:Account{account: event.txn_rcv}) CREATE (snd)-[:PAYMENT {txid: event.txid, amount: event.txn_amt, fee: event.txn_fee, blockNumber: event.round, intraBlockNumber: event.intra, paymentType: CASE WHEN event.txn_close IS NOT NULL THEN "closeAccount" ELSE "pay" END}]->(rcv) ) FOREACH (x IN CASE WHEN event.typeenum = 1 AND event.txn_rcv IS NULL THEN [1] ELSE [] END | MERGE (snd:Account{account: event.txn_snd}) MERGE (rcv:Account{account: event.txn_close}) CREATE (snd)-[:PAYMENT {txid: event.txid, amount: event.txn_amt, fee: event.txn_fee, blockNumber: event.round, intraBlockNumber: event.intra, paymentType: CASE WHEN event.txn_close IS NOT NULL THEN "closeAccount" ELSE "pay" END}]->(rcv) )
